title: Lvl 4 Spells
content: Minor Elemental Conjuration ActionLevel 4 Spell Slot Yes Conjure a minor elemental to fight alongside you.18m Druid, Wizard Conjure Woodland Beings Conjuration ActionLevel 4 Spell Slot Yes Summon from 1 fey of CR 2 to 8 fey of CR 1/4, friendly (nbr of creatures/lvl). Druid, Ranger Death Ward Abjuration ActionLevel 4 Spell Slot No When the target drops to 0 hp for the first time, it automatically returns to 1 hp. Cleric, Death Domain, Life Domain, Paladin, Undying, Grave Domain, Ambition Domain D
